alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harrison and east central Hancock Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lyman, or 9 miles north of Long Beach, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Diamondhead, D`iberville, Saucier and Lyman. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 18 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
